parameters.name: crusher_speed
parameters.description: Speed of the crusher motor in revolutions per minute.

parameters.name: crusher_load
parameters.description: Load applied to the crusher, representing the weight of material being processed.

parameters.name: power_consumption
parameters.description: Power consumption of the crusher during operation.

parameters.name: belt_speed
parameters.description: Speed of the conveyor belt transporting crushed material.

parameters.name: vibration_level
parameters.description: General vibration level of the crusher during operation.

parameters.name: crusher_torque
parameters.description: Torque applied by the crusher's motor to process material.

parameters.name: machine_wear_index
parameters.description: Percentage representing wear and tear of the crusher over time.

parameters.name: maintenance_time_since_last_service
parameters.description: Time in hours since the crusher was last maintained.

parameters.name: advanced_vibration
parameters.description: Advanced vibration measurement used for preemptive maintenance.

parameters.name: overload_events
parameters.description: Number of overload events experienced by the crusher.

external_influence.description: Bearing temperature is influenced by outside temperature.

parameters.name: remaining_useful_life
parameters.description: Estimated remaining useful life of the crusher.
